SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.util.logging

Class Log4J2Configurator

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.util.logging.Log4J2Configurator
public final class Log4J2Configurator extends Object
Configures Log4J2 to log to a file at the specified path.

Only logs messages from the package nl.pim16aap2.

This class is a singleton. Use getInstance() to get the instance.

    • setLogPath

      public void setLogPath(Path path)
      Sets the path to log to.
